dbi.pg.PgDatabase

Authors:
The D DBI project

class PgDatabase: dbi.BaseDatabase.BaseDatabase;
Manage a PostgreSQL database connection. This class implements all of the current DBD interface as defined in Database. Functions are not going to be explained in detail here, please see other references listed below.

BUGS:
PgDatabase currently does not retrieve column types.

See Also:
BaseDatabase, Database

void connect(char[] conn, char[] user = null, char[] passwd = null);
Connect to a database.

Params:
connString Connection string.
char[] user Username to authenticate with.
char[] passwd Password to use for authentication.

BUGS:
Doesn't convert the error to ErrorCode.

Connection String Keywords:

void close();


void execute(char[] sql);


Result query(char[] sql);


deprecated int getErrorCode();


deprecated char[] getErrorMessage();
